titles.title: He Brought Me to His Banqueting Table

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He brought me to his banqueting table (Women echo)
He brought me to his banqueting table (Women echo)
And his banner over me is love

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am my beloved's and He is mine (Women echo)
I am my beloved's and He is mine (Women echo)
And His banner over me is love
Yes His banner over me is love

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We can feel the love of God in this place
We believe your goodness
We receive your grace
We delight ourselves at your table oh God
You do all things well, just look at our lives

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And His banner over me is love
Yes His banner over me is love

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
His banner over you, his banner over me
His banner over us, it is love, love, love
